PAGE_TITLE: axis | The easiest way to send, spend & get paid
PAGE_DESCRIPTION: With axis, you can send money to friends instantly and for free, buy anything online, request money from anyone, earn rewards and cashback, and understand your spending habits so that you can budget.
GET_STARTED_MODAL_PARAGRAPH: We believe that financial services should be more accessible, simple, and fun. Sign up to be among the first to try out our product.
GET_STARTED_MODAL_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
GET_STARTED_SUCCESS_MODAL_PARAGRAPH: Thank you for leaving us your details. We will be in touch soon.
SECTION_1_HEADING: The easiest way to send, spend & get paid
SECTION_1_PARAGRAPH_1: Licensed by the Central Bank of Egypt
SECTION_1_PARAGRAPH_2: No bank account needed! All you need is your National ID
SECTION_2_HEADING: Send money to anyone on any mobile wallet for free
SECTION_2_PARAGRAPH: It will arrive instantly even if it's a weekend, in the middle of the night, or a bank holiday
SECTION_3_HEADING: Buy anything online securely with our virtual Visa card
SECTION_3_PARAGRAPH: Buy anything online with our virtual Visa card - from your favourite fashion brands to your music streaming subscription. Create as many virtual Visa cards (for single transaction) for extra security
SECTION_4_HEADING: The most affordable digital wallet for your daily needs
SECTION_4_PARAGRAPH: Transfer money for free, and  instantly, pay bills, shop online, and manage finances effortlessly - all while saving money
SECTION_5_PARAGRAPH: Disburse payments instantly to any wallet or bank account in Egypt. Enjoy best-in-class reporting, easy API integration, and seamless operations 24/7
SECTION_6_PARAGRAPH: Make international payments to Egypt instantly. Reach wallets and bank accounts in seconds and enjoy accurate, real time, cross-border payments
SECTION_7_HEADING: Get discounts & cashback from your favourite brands
SECTION_7_PARAGRAPH: Access offers from your favourite brands and get discounts & cashback on your wallet to spend on other things!
SECTION_8_HEADING: Pay your bills in seconds & set up recurring payments
SECTION_8_PARAGRAPH: Buy phone credit & pay your electricity, gas, & water bill directly from the app. You can also set up recurring bill payments! No need to waste time in traffic and stand in queues every month!
SECTION_9_HEADING: Save money with our savings pots (coming soon)
SECTION_9_PARAGRAPH: Save money for specific occasions like Eid, summer holidays, or to buy a new phone. Just set a savings goal, and we will help you reach it!
SECTION_10_CARD_1_PARAGRAPH: Get a breakdown of your spending so that you can start to budget!
SECTION_10_CARD_2_HEADING: Say goodbye to hidden fees forever
SECTION_10_CARD_2_PARAGRAPH: We don't believe in hidden fees or fine print. No minimum balance. No admin fees. No monthly fees.
SECTION_10_CARD_3_HEADING: Cash in or cash out from any ATM or Fawry
SECTION_10_CARD_3_PARAGRAPH: Cash in from any ATM or Fawry, or via Instapay. Cash out from any ATM or Fawry.
SECTION_10_CARD_4_PARAGRAPH: If you need help, our agents are available 24/7 by phone on <0>{consumerSupportHotline}, in-app chat, and email at <1>{consumerSupportEmail}</1>.
SECTION_11_PARAGRAPH_1: axis is regulated by the Central Bank of Egypt and we use secure processes to protect your information and to prevent unauthorized use. Your entire money in the wallet is secured.
SECTION_11_PARAGRAPH_2--commentted: We have partnerships with Mashreq Bank & Visa and are certified by Meeza Digital to deliver you the most secure service.
SECTION_11_PARAGRAPH_2: We have a partnership with Visa and are certified by Meeza Digital to deliver you the most secure service.
SECTION_12_PARAGRAPH: Are you selling something on Social Media? Ask for a down payment or the full amount on your axis wallet and receive it instantly!
SECTION_13_PARAGRAPH: Join the axis movement to help improve access to financial services! Check out our vacancies here!
